abstract: Wheels column; safety experts wonder why National Highway Traffic Safety Admin has not yet asked for safety recall of 2012 Ford Focus; agency has received 150 complaints about power steering failure and 124 reports from automaker attributing injuries and deaths to steering problem.
lead_paragraph: Federal safety regulators have received about 150 complaints that the Focus’s power steering can turn off, but they have not opened a formal investigation, and Ford has taken limited action.

headline.main: Ford Focus Steering Problem Prompts Many Complaints, but No Inquiry
headline.print_headline: A Steering Problem Brings Many Complaints, but Little Action

snippet: Federal safety regulators have received about 150 complaints that the Focus’s power steering can turn off, but they have not opened a formal investigation, and Ford has taken limited action.
